name: Becoming the Buddha.
description:
“A Bodhisattva doesn’t have to be perfect. Anyone who is aware of what is happening and who tries to wake up other people is a Bodhisattva. We are all Bodhisattvas, doing our best.”-Thich Nhat Hanh

We are all here for enlightenment and helping  enlighten others. A Boddhisatva is a Buddha who experiences Nirvana, ultimate bliss, enlightenment. But doesn’t stay there, comes back, and shows the others the way. They understand that both worlds are the same. 

That is what is happening here, and there. Both visually and spiritually. 

You are right where you are supposed to be. 

Music by @robotkingpin
